nodes.text: The L60 blaster rifle was a model of blaster rifle that was utilized by the Toydarian Guard during the Clone Wars. The L60 was manufactured through a contract specifically for the Toydarian Guard. It featured an ornate wood-veneered stock with a modified trigger guard for Toydarian physiology. The L60 was considered to be a light weapon, but were simple, accurate and had a small rate of fire, though the guardsmen were trained to make every shot count. Additionally, the L60 had a long range telescopic sight and an energy clip slotted on one side.
